WorkItem.Description:
Rawr will complete freeze and stay at 100% cpu if you select specific items.
Porcelain Crap as an example cause Rawr to spike to 100% cpu and stay
unresponsive. If i use Rawr 4.1.04 this doesn't happen.

Comments.Message:
In the Rawr 4.1.05 patch notes:
Properly average the value of temporary Mastery effects (e.g. Trinkets) to cap out their effective value while active, rather than averaging as if the entire value was effective.

These items seems to be the ones causing Rawr to crash.
Can you provide you character file without selecting the items that is locking up your computer?
Issue has been resolved in Rawr 4.2.0 and is no longer makes rawr lock-up.
